data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 PB 2
data.actual_result: The keyboard always swaps back to the alphabet mode.
data.expected_result: The keyboard should stay in the number mode after typing 1 digit.
data.short_description: Keyboard swaps back from numbers to alphabet mode after each digit typed in the Xbox pin input
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your user settings - Open connections - Click on the add button in the top right corner - Select `Xbox Live` - Switch the keyboard to number mode by clicking on `.?123` - Type 1 digit
